title: He Laughed, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition, and Chop lower margin in pencil: [1990/Nicolas Africano]; a
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man standing with hands on hips; baggy pants; no shoes, shirt or hat
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
